Title: ArsenalPics
Description: ArsenalPics is a XBAP app for viewing and downloading wallpapers from official site of Arsenal FC.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ArsenalPics is a XBAP app for viewing and downloading wallpapers from official site of Arsenal FC.

This app parses  http://www.arsenal.com/the-match/wallpapers and creates a tree, where you can select wallpaper with desired resolution.

 

How to use:

  1. Download and unpack the app. 
  2. Open ArsenalPics.xbap in Internet Explorer (right click - Run as..). 
  3. Select tree item to see image.
  4. Right click on image: save image or set it as desktop background. 
  5. Press "Get Next 20" to load more images!
